thread.title: 40 top leading IT firms in Vietnam
thread.title_full: SGGP English Edition- 40 top leading IT firms in Vietnam

author: Tran Binh – Translated by Hai Mien
title: 40 top leading IT firms in Vietnam
text:
The Vietnam Software Association has officially announced 40 Vietnam’s Leading IT Companies 2015 in Hanoi yesterday.
40 Vietnam's leading IT firms were announced at a ceremony in Hanoi on October 12 (Photo: SGGP )
The program was hosted for the first time last year to choose and introduce prestigious and qualified IT firms to potential partners, and contribute in implementing the Politburo’s IT decree for sustainable development and global integration.
The event was implemented since August this year and attracted nearly 100 nominations.
Association’s chairman Truong Gia Binh said that the 40 selected have total revenue of up to VND14.3 trillion (US$638.35 million) accounting for one forth of the software and digital content industry’s revenue.
They provide jobs to 23,300 high-level workers accounting for one sixth of the IT industry’s human resource.
